ovdesc.p: This application holds the charges/fees related fields that are used to deduct from the actual interest counter before selling funds in the scope.Deduction is made only on the Interest Counter (IC) calculation and not on the Capital Gains (CG) calculation. If the interest counter value is negative, then the interest counter should be zero and no tax is to be applied.

desc.p: This field holds the percentage specific charges/fees related field names pertaining to the application specified in the APPLICATION.NAME field.
The field name entered should be a valid entry in STANDARD.SELECTION record of the respective application as a key specified in the APPLICATION.NAME field.
